duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing general and preventative maintenance repairs including carpentry, plumbing, painting, electrical, appliance repair, HVAC, and masonry work in accordance with company standards and local building codes.
Maintenance service requests (work orders) completion in a professional and courteous manner.
Scheduled maintenance turnover work and preventative maintenance in accordance with the community’s program.
Assisting in maintaining inventory, equipment, and workshop in a neat and orderly working condition.
Providing information to the Property Management Staff regarding safety concerns and the general appearance of the community.
Participating in on-call maintenance and performing other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Certificate in Maintenance Technology preferred)
